InlineCreate.Title: New Issue
InlineCreate.ShortHelp: Allows you to create a new issue.
InlineCreate.LongHelp: You can create issues that define problems that need to be resolved or functionality that needs to be investigated or improved.
Filter.Title: Filter By
Filter.ShortHelp: Allows you to filter the list of issues.
Filter.LongHelp: If no filter is selected, no issues appear. Therefore, you must select a filter to view issues.
session.Title: Nothing in Session
session.ShortHelp: Shows if you do not have a saved session.
session.LongHelp: In Issue Management, a session is a list of issues that have been consolidated manually and is static.
reset-session.Title: Reset Session
reset-session.LongHelp: In Issue Management, a session is a list of issues that have been consolidated manually and is static.
owned.Title: Owned by Me
owned.ShortHelp: Issues where I am listed as the Owner or Coordinator.
assigned.Title: Assigned to Me
assigned.ShortHelp: Issues where I am an Assignee.
reported.Title: Owned by My Organization(s)
reported.ShortHelp: All issues where my organization reported the issue.
reported.LongHelp: This filter appears if you enable Show Organization Filters in the Preferences panel.
responsible.Title: Assigned to My Organization(s)
responsible.ShortHelp: All issues where my organization is responsible for resolving the issue.
responsible.LongHelp: This filter appears if you enable Show Organization Filters in the Preferences panel.
contributed.Title: Where I Contribute
contributed.ShortHelp: All issues where I am a participant.
closed.Title: Completed
closed.LongHelp: This filter shows additional criteria to other selected filters. All issues in a completed maturity state including the issues that meet the current filter criteria are shown.
filterbyobject.Title: Filter by Object
filterbyobject.ShortHelp: All objects. This filter opens a search field where you can enter the name of the object to filter.
filterbyobject.LongHelp:
A Settings menu is available in the 'Search for an object to filter' field that allows you to refine your search for objects by type. The options are:
  • Affected Items
  • Resolved Items
  • Context

Enable 'Automatically add selected object during issue creation' to add the selected object to either Affected Items or Contexts when creating the issue.

Note: The object is not added to Create Issue panels opened from other apps.
ChangeAction.Title: New Change Action as Resolved By
ChangeAction.ShortHelp: Allows you to use a change action as the Resolved By object.
ChangeAction.LongHelp: The maturity state of the issue depends on the maturity state of the change objects used to resolve it.
3DMarkup.Title: Add a New 3D Markup as an Attachment
3DMarkup.LongHelp: This allows you to create a markup to add to the list of attachments.
Subscription.Title: Subscription
Subscription.ShortHelp: Subscribe to issues so that you are notified when certain events occur.
Subscription.LongHelp: You can Subscribe, Unsubscribe, Edit, and View your subscriptions.
subscribe.Title: Subscribe
subscribe.LongHelp: You can subscribe to issues so that you are notified when certain events occur. For example, When you subscribe to an issue event such as maturity transition, the 3DEXPERIENCE platform notifies you whenever that event occurs for that specific issue.
unSubscribe.Title: Unsubscribe
unSubscribe.LongHelp: You are no longer notified when certain events occur to an issue.
editSubscription.Title: Edit Subscriptions
editSubscription.ShortHelp: You can specify the issue events that you want to be notified about.
editSubscription.LongHelp:
Select any of the following issue events to receive notifications. To stop receiving these notifications, clear the associated check box:
  • Add Affected Item
  • Remove Affected Item
  • Add Resolved By
  • Remove Resolved By
  • Maturity Transition
mySubscription.Title: My Subscriptions
mySubscription.ShortHelp: Lists all issues and events to which you are subscribed.
mySubscription.LongHelp: Use the Find field to search for issues in the My Subscriptions panel. Enter a minimum of four characters and click Search.
customizeDatagridView.Title: Configure Table Views
customizeDatagridView.ShortHelp: Allows you to customize the columns that appear in Table view.
customizeDatagridView.LongHelp: The Table View Configuration panel allows you to (for example), show, hide, rename, sort and pin columns.
customizeKanbanView.Title: Configure Table Views
customizeKanbanView.ShortHelp: Allows you to customize the columns that appear in Kanban view.
customizeKanbanView.LongHelp: The Kanban view shows a column for each maturity state that lists the issues in that maturity state. You can change the Kanban view to display the issues in columns of priority, due date, or all (single column with all issues).
SelectAllIssues.Title: Select all Issues
SelectAllIssues.ShortHelp: Selects all issues in the list but not any related objects.
SelectAllRelatedObjects.Title: Select All Visible Issue Content
SelectAllRelatedObjects.ShortHelp: Selects all related objects but not any issues.
SelectAllRelatedObjects.LongHelp: Only selects content for issues that you expand in the list. It does not select the content of collapsed issues.
UnselectAll.Title: Unselect Objects
right.Title: Display at Right
right.ShortHelp: Allows you to display the Information tabs on the right-side of the page.
right.LongHelp: The Information tabs display general information about the issue and allow you to perform various actions on the issue.
bottom.Title: Display at Bottom
bottom.ShortHelp: Allows you to display the Information tabs at the bottom of the page.
bottom.LongHelp: The Information tabs display general information about the issue and allow you to perform various actions on the issue.
ResolvedBy.Title: Resolve the Issue
ResolvedBy.ShortHelp: Allows you to resolve the issue.
ResolvedBy.LongHelp: You can specify a new task or a new change action as the resolved by object.
CreateTask.Title: New Task as Resolved By
CreateTask.ShortHelp: Allows you to use a task as the Resolved By object.
CreateTask.LongHelp:
There are two types of tasks that you can create and add as resolved by:
  • Project Management tasks
  • Project Planning tasks
AddResolvedByUsingSearch.Title: Add Existing
AddResolvedByUsingSearch.ShortHelp: Allows you to add an existing object as the resolved by object.
AddResolvedByUsingSearch.LongHelp: Use search to find the object you want to use as the resolved by object.
